heading: 2. The Misuse of Drugs (Prescription and Control of Supply of Cannabis

title: substituting for Schedule 1 (as amended by Regulation 2 of the Misuse of Drugs
heading: 3. The following are revoked:
text_raw:
3. The following are revoked: 

(a) 

the Misuse of Drugs (Prescription and Control of Supply of 
Cannabis for Medical Use) (Amendment) Regulations 2019 (S.I. 
No. 583 of 2019); and 

(b) 

the Misuse of Drugs (Prescription and Control of Supply of 
Cannabis for Medical Use) (Amendment) Regulations 2019. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 October, 2020. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [505]

title: substituting for Schedule 1 (as amended by Regulation 2 of the Misuse of Drugs
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of these Regulations is to amend the Misuse of Drugs (Prescription 
and Control of Supply of Cannabis for Medical Use) Regulations 2019 to replace 
Schedule 1 in order to list certain cannabis products or preparations for medical 
use as “specified controlled drugs”. 

These Regulations may be cited as the Misuse of Drugs (Prescription and 
Control of Supply of Cannabis for Medical Use) (Amendment) Regulations
